pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD 1700x (or greater)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX580 (or greater)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
